ImprovementType.Description: Demonshrill Camps can be built on Demonshrill Lairs to recruit Demonshrill.
Fiery Gorgon Camps can be built on Gorgon Lairs to recruit Fiery Gorgons.

GameModifier.Provides: Recruit a Party of Fiery Gorgons

ImprovementType.Description: Greater Demonshrill Camps can be built on Demonshrill Lairs to recruit Greater Demonshrill.

GameModifier.Provides: Recruit a Squad of Greater Demonshrill

ImprovementType.Description: Greater Fiery Gorgon Camps can be built on Gorgon Lairs to recruit Greater Fiery Gorgons.

GameModifier.Provides: Recruit a Squad of Greater Fiery Gorgons

ImprovementType.Description: Greater Halfdrake Camps can be built on Halfdrake Lairs to recruit Greater Halfdrakes.

GameModifier.Provides: Recruit a Squad of Greater Halfdrakes

ImprovementType.Description: Greater Ophidian Gorgon Camps can be built on Ophidian Gorgon Lairs to recruit Greater Ophidian Gorgons.

GameModifier.Provides: Recruit a Squad of Greater Ophidian Gorgons

ImprovementType.Description: Halfdrake Camps can be built on Halfdrake Lairs to recruit Halfdrakes.
Ophidian Gorgon Camps can be built on Ophidian Gorgon Lairs to recruit Ophidian Gorgons.

GameModifier.Provides: Recruit a Party of Ophidian Gorgons

ImprovementType.Description: Wolfman Camps can be built on Wolfman Lairs to recruit Wolfmen.
The dragon eggs let you build a Dragonkind Temple.
Stone-Fire Altars amplify Fire spells and provide 1 Mana per turn. They also boost Fire attack by 5% faction-wide.
Stone-Fire Shrines amplify Fire spells and provide 2 Mana per turn. They also boost Fire attack by 10% faction-wide.
Stone-Fire Temples amplify Fire spells and provide 3 Mana per turn. They also boost Fire attack by 15% faction-wide.
Increases the player's borders and improves their visibility.
